Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission reference 231604FUL dated 30.05.2024 for "Construction of 7 residential buildings (4-7 storeys in height) to provide 220 residential units; conversion of existing farmhouse and barns to provide a cafe/commercial unit (Class E); and improved public access between Northala Fields and Marnham Fields with associated enhanced landscaping, parking and refuse storage". Amendment to the tenure of the dwellings to provide 100% of the approved dwellings as affordable.
